entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening and ending before morning then 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
